Testing might allow for a substantial reduction in the length of, or replacement of,
quarantine with a small excess in transmission risk. Decreasing test and trace delays
and increasing adherence will further increase the effectiveness of these strategies.

articles.title: Where’s my nearest vaccination hub? Full list of mass Covid vaccine centres - The Sun

TEN new mass Covid vaccine super-hubs across the country have started giving jabs today.
